Username: v2ldt-emmi; Password: v2ldt-emmi EX-433 and EE-430 paper code(s) are comprehensively covered in DLBTE-EMMI course. Check out your complete syllabus coverage in Curriculum Coverage Plan (CCP). [tabby title=EX-433] DLBTE offers this course under the name Electronic instruments and measurement.
  • 51 Video Learning Outcomes attained across 30 topics taught over 18 hours of instruction.
  • Total duration of course: 18 hours
[tabby title=EE-430] DLBTE offers this course under the name Electrical measurements & measuring instruments.
  • 80 Video Learning Outcomes attained across 39 topics taught over 26 hours of instruction.
  • Total duration of course: 26 hours
[tabbyending] V2L courses enjoy a finely granulated hierarchy organised by Units, Sections, Topics, Video Learning Modules (VLM) and Concept Learning Outcomes (CLO). A CLO is a statement of what a student should expect to recall, solve or perform upon its completion. Course Faculty carry several years of teaching and industry experience. The lessons are taught systematically, and delivered in simple, lucid language and manner. Courses are designed to inculcate a clear understanding of subject-concepts and enable students to gain theoretical and practical insights.
